results.title: Combined angiotensin-converting enzyme and aminopeptidase inhibition for treatment of experimental ventilator-induced lung injury in mice
results.text_hl: Results: High tidal volume-ventilated @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ showed a significant @<m>DISEASE_Peroneal_Neuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020427 @@@drop in the mean arterial pressure@@@ at 4 h compared to baseline, which was prevented by adding ALT-00 at 10 and 100 mug/kg/min.

citations.NLM: Mao X, Tretter V, Zhu Y, Kraft F, Vigl B, Poglitsch M, Ullrich R, Abraham D, Krenn K. Combined angiotensin-converting enzyme and aminopeptidase inhibition for treatment of experimental ventilator-induced lung injury in mice Front Physiol. 2023;14():1109452. PMID: 37064885
